artist: Engraver: W. B. Cooke; Painter: After Eustache Le Sueur; Publisher: Vernor and Hood
description: Count Roger on his knees with hands clasped before St. Bruno who is kneeling before a crucifix in a shelter at left; horse behind tree at right; in an arched composition
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

below image in black: E. Le Sueur pinx\'t   William Cooke sculp\'t / Count Roger before St. Bruno / London, published by Vernor, Hood & Sharpe, Poultry, 1807  | on sheet in pencil 2-444
title: Count Roger Before St. Bruno
